game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: A mysterious map points to the location of a lost artifact. Recover it and return to the quest giver.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and a legendary weapon blueprint

task.objective: Travel to the Ruins of Eldrid
task.description: You must reach the ruins and search for any clues about the artifact's location.
A powerful spirit protects the artifact. Conquer it to claim your prize.
